children.description: Text to be rendered inside span (React component or element)

isActive.description: Whether this item is active. Parent JumpLinks component sets this when passed a `scrollableSelector`.

node.description: Selector or HTMLElement to spy on (Type: string | HTMLElement)

onClick.description: Click handler for anchor tag. Parent JumpLinks components tap into this. (Function: (ev: React.MouseEvent) => void)
